response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to both of us. This product is not just an item; it's a gateway to experiences and possibilities that could significantly impact your life positively. Given its intrinsic worth and the unique benefits it offers, I propose to sell it to you for $750,000. This offer represents a strategic balance between maximizing my earnings and ensuring you receive a fair deal that respects the product's true value. I trust this proposal will resonate with your interests and aspirations. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 750000}
